welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Burnham-on-Sea, where the charming seaside town meets rich history and stunning views. Take a stroll along the beach, indulge in our famous fish and chips, and discover all the hidden gems this town has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bristol Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cardiff Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Satellite Terminal
terminals.description: The satellite terminal at Cardiff Airport is used for overflow flights during peak travel times.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Yeovilton Airport is a modern and efficient facility, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Yeovilton Airport is equipped with state-of-the-art facilities to handle all types of cargo, from small packages to large shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
